message: I'm curious to know if anyone thinks Rails is missing some great features, or if there's anything you would like to see in the next major feature releases of Rails
Well, I'd like to not have Rails mess with assets as it's currently planned. Also, a clear indication on how to inject Presenter classes when they're needed would be good.
@batarski I'm pretty sure you can turn off most/all of the asset stuff by commenting out a  line in your config/application file. At least that's how it was in 3.1 beta.
